attributes.action: Make It A Criminal Offence To Suggest Or Encourage Someone To Kill Themselves.
attributes.additional_details: 1 in 4 young people in the UK have mental health issues. in 2014 The annual suicide total was 6122 people, this corresponds to 10.8 out of 100,000 people will commit suicide with many more attempting. This Morning Showed A story of a young girl who took her life after receiving  such message. which myself and many others have got and acted on it. Under The Mental Health Act Also Should State This With Its Legislation .
attributes.background: The ITV Programme This Morning Showed A story of a young girl who took her life after receiving  such message. which myself and many others have got and acted on such vile words, myself which resulted me requiring ICU, words that have resulted in friends and this young girl to not be here today!
